1023920.name: Rainswept - Original Soundtrack
1023920.description:
The Official Soundtrack for Rainswept, consisting of 28 tracks - 1 hour 36 minutes of original music from the game! The soundtrack has been composed by micamic (Michal Michalski) and includes tracks by Kitty and Sam Ray.

Track listing:

1. Welcome to Pineview
2. Downpour
3. Investigation
4. Rainswept
5. Linger
6. Church on the Rock
7. Exploring Pineview
8. Sunny Cafe
9. Sunny Cafe - Nostalgia
10. Mountain Road
11. Mountain Road - Detour
12. Mountain Road - Scenic Route
13. The Old Woods
14. The Old Woods (Ambient)
15. Malaise
16. Uncovered Details
17. Overcast Sunrise
18. Hopelessness
19. Allan's Pub
20. A Rainy Morning
21. A Rainy Morning (Ambient)
22. Chasing Firelights
23. Defeat
24. Unfolding
25. A Hopeful Morning (Ambient)
26. A Hopeful Morning
27. Just in Case
28. Universe Away


Credits:

Music by micamic
"Universe Away" and "Just in Case" by Kitty and Sam Ray

Format: MP3
